name: AutoSwitch-enable_miui_security_ime
description: 打开需要软件时修改enable_miui_security_ime，退出软件后切换回来(miui特供)
condition: if(frontPkgChanged == true){if (globalVarOf$TheAppDontNeed_miui_security_ime.contains(to)) {su.exe("settings put secure enable_miui_security_ime 0"));} else if (globalVarOf$TheAppDontNeed_miui_security_ime.contains(from)) {su.exe("settings put secure enable_miui_security_ime 1"));}}
